channel.title: I have just recently bought a VPS, but i need to ask some questions =/
channel.description:
Hello, i have just recently bought an VPS (virtual private server) From http://vpsland.com And i have paid for it and everything they have sent me about 4 emails saying my reciept and id number..etc...Anyway heres my questions:
1) How long till i receive the log in information? 2) I have signed up for the website and soon as i bought the VPS i can't login no more it says my email address is unknown :/
Thanks, please answer.
- King
[MOD] - If i have posted in the wrong section please move, I had to hurry with this question, thanks!

item.title: I have just recently bought a VPS, but i need to ask some questions =/
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:397236”]1. It will take up to 48 hours, if not received at that time. You will either need to call them or submit a support ticket.

  1. Recover the password, or call customer support. If I remember correctly, I thought it used an username or password, I don’t quite remember.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: I have just recently bought a VPS, but i need to ask some questions =/

item.title: I have just recently bought a VPS, but i need to ask some questions =/
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

  1. It will take up to 48 hours, if not received at that time. You will either need to call them or submit a support ticket.

  2. Recover the password, or call customer support. If I remember correctly, I thought it used an username or password, I don’t quite remember.

Read full topic
item.source: I have just recently bought a VPS, but i need to ask some questions =/
